Video Illustrations

Here is a look at many illustrated frames I have completed for various video marketing projects.

Illustration

During my time at Simple Story, I have had the privilege of illustrating many videos for various clients.

Every video explores a different style to match the tone, feel and ultimate goal of each video. Every project allows me to develop new skills and try out different techniques to bring ideas to life!

DATE

May 2019 - Present

Venison

Venison is part of the video series from The High Desert Sonnets. I had the opportunity to illustrate the frames that were later animated.

ESDC

This video's purposed is to educate businesses on how to make their payment terminals accessible for everyone. It explains how it can be difficult for certain individuals to use payment terminals and ways to make it easier.

York University

We created 5 videos for York University's Back to School social media campaign. Each video explores a different topic, such as how to properly manage your time. This particular style mixes photography with illustrated elements!
